statements: SELECT * FROM security_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, incident_type FROM security_incidents WHERE severity > 3;
SELECT description FROM security_incidents WHERE reporter = 'John Doe';
SELECT incident_type, severity FROM security_incidents ORDER BY severity DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_incidents FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM security_incidents WHERE severity > 5 ORDER BY incident_date DESC
SELECT incident_type, description FROM security_incidents WHERE severity < 3 ORDER BY severity ASC
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, severity FROM security_incidents WHERE reporter = 'John Doe'
SELECT incident_type, COUNT(*) AS total_incidents FROM security_incidents GROUP BY incident_type ORDER BY total_incidents DESC
SELECT * FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach';
SELECT id, incident_type, timestamp FROM security_incidents WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT incident_description FROM security_incidents WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM siem_logs WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.100';
SELECT log_id, log_timestamp, log_message FROM siem_logs WHERE destination_ip = '10.0.0.5';
SELECT * FROM security_incidents WHERE status='resolved';
SELECT incident_description, incident_type FROM security_incidents WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT incident_type, COUNT(id) AS num_incidents FROM security_incidents GROUP BY incident_type;
SELECT * FROM siem_logs WHERE source_ip='192.168.1.1' AND destination_ip='10.0.0.1';
SELECT log_timestamp, log_message FROM siem_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM SecurityEvents;
SELECT event_id, event_date, event_type FROM SecurityEvents WHERE event_type = 'Login';
SELECT event_id, event_date, event_description FROM SecurityEvents ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, severity FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE severity > 5;
SELECT * FROM SecurityAlerts WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM SecurityEvents WHERE event_type = 'Data Breach' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_date, event_type FROM SecurityEvents WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' AND event_type LIKE '%Attack%' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, incident_type, severity FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE severity > 5 ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT alert_id, alert_date, alert_type, status FROM SecurityAlerts WHERE alert_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY alert_date ASC;
SELECT alert_id, alert_type, alert_description FROM SecurityAlerts WHERE alert_type IN ('Critical', 'High') AND status = 'Open';
SELECT * FROM security_incidents;
SELECT id, incident_name, incident_timestamp FROM security_incidents ORDER BY incident_timestamp DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_type FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'Authentication';
SELECT incident_name, incident_description FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT log_timestamp, log_message FROM siem_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents ORDER BY incident_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT incident_name, incident_description FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY incident_timestamp ASC;

SELECT siem_logs.log_message, siem_logs.log_timestamp, security_events.event_name FROM siem_logs JOIN security_events ON siem_logs.event_id = security_events.id WHERE security_events.event_type = 'malware' ORDER BY siem_logs.log_timestamp DESC;

SELECT incident_name, incident_description, incident_timestamp, response_description FROM security_incidents JOIN incident_responses ON security_incidents.id = incident_responses.incident_id ORDER BY incident_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT security_events.event_name, security_events.event_type, siem_logs.log_message, siem_logs.log_timestamp FROM security_events JOIN siem_logs ON security_events.id = siem_logs.event_id WHERE siem_logs.log_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY siem_logs.log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_logs;
SELECT log_id, event_type, event_date FROM security_logs;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, status FROM security_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM siem_users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT device_name, device_type, device_status FROM siem_devices WHERE device_status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM security_logs WHERE event_type = 'Login' AND event_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT event_type, event_description FROM security_logs WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, status FROM security_incidents WHERE status = 'open'
SELECT user_id, email, role FROM siem_users WHERE role IN ('Admin', 'Analyst') ORDER BY username ASC
SELECT device_name, device_status FROM siem_devices WHERE device_type = 'Firewall'
